backend/main.mo: Defines the main canister actor with access control, storage mixins, user approval, and extensive gym-management types for members, plans, payments, bookings, workouts, diets, and reports.
backend/migration.mo: Contains type definitions and structures used during migration tasks, supporting member profiles, credentials, communication logs, and various gym-related entities.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a specific authentication-related feature to affected frontend files, component versions, and test identifiers.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing short descriptions for many frontend components, hooks, and pages involved in the gym management system.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables, theme layers, and dark mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading the React application via main.tsx and mounting it to the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling authentication for both admins and email/password members, initializing backend actors, and routing users to login or respective dashboards.
frontend/src/components/admin/Communicat: Displays an alert explaining that communication logs are simulated and not actually delivered.
Shows simulated communication logs and member credentials after manual member creation, with copy utilities.
frontend/src/components/admin/FinancialM: Financial dashboard for viewing payments and expenses and adding new payment or expense entries.
frontend/src/components/admin/MemberMana: Admin interface for viewing, searching, creating, editing, and deleting members, managing membership plans, and handling profile picture uploads with pagination.
frontend/src/components/admin/Reports.ts: Generates admin reports including revenue, expenses, membership stats, and sorted member status lists with charts and metrics.
frontend/src/components/admin/StaffManag: Placeholder card indicating upcoming staff management features like trainer profiles and schedules.
Layout component handling header UI, theme switch, profile dropdowns, and logout logic for admin and member roles.
frontend/src/components/member/Attendanc: Displays a member’s attendance records in a sortable table with check‑in and check‑out details.
frontend/src/components/member/ClassBook: Allows members to book, view, and cancel class sessions, with dialogs for creating bookings and status badges.
frontend/src/components/member/MemberOve: Shows member profile, membership status, days to expiry, and monthly attendance summary with profile picture support.
frontend/src/components/member/MemberPor: Member dashboard combining profile info, attendance, bookings, payments, and notifications into a unified view.
frontend/src/components/member/MyDiet.ts: Displays a member's diet plan with macros and meals, handling loading and missing-plan states.
frontend/src/components/member/MyWorkout: Shows a member's workout plan, including duration and exercises, with loading and no-plan fallback.
frontend/src/components/member/Notificat: Renders prioritized, dismissible notifications with styling, icons, and optional action buttons.
frontend/src/components/member/PaymentWa: Fetches and displays payment totals and history with status badges and loading handling.
frontend/src/components/ProfilePictureMo: Modal for viewing a full-size profile picture with close controls.
Profile settings dialog allowing users to edit profile info, upload profile pictures, and manage roles if admin.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Empty placeholder component with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/QRCodeDialog.tsx: Generates and displays a member QR code with options to copy data and close the dialog.
frontend/src/components/trainer/Assigned: Empty file placeholder for trainer assigned-members component.
frontend/src/components/trainer/DietBuil: Empty file placeholder for trainer diet-builder component.
frontend/src/components/trainer/MemberDe: Empty file placeholder for trainer member-details dialog.
frontend/src/components/trainer/WorkoutB: Empty file placeholder for trainer workout-builder component.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for user profiles, roles, and authentication plus helpers for serializing member profiles and checking email/password members.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Renders the admin dashboard with tabbed sections for members, financials, staff, and reports.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Implements member and Internet Identity login flows with form handling, error messaging, and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/MemberDashboard.tsx: Displays the member dashboard using DashboardLayout and MemberPortal.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Describes the app’s current state, issues, and feature requests for a gym management system, including notification failures and missing real authentication for admin‑created members. Contains architectural notes, known issues, existing features, and new features to be implemented.
